Sinister City
Who would name their town Sinister City? Vampires, of course! When John discovers his bride-to-be has been kidnapped by Sinister City's number one bloodsucker, there's only one thing to do - search for hidden objects! And kill vampires! Or at least insult them until they give your girl back.
User reviews: Mixed (812 reviews) - 67% of the 812 user reviews for this game are positive.
Release Date: Oct 18, 2014

About This Game

Who would name their town Sinister City? Vampires, of course! When John discovers his bride-to-be has been kidnapped by Sinister City's number one bloodsucker, there's only one thing to do - search for hidden objects! And kill vampires! Or at least insult them until they give your girl back.
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows XP
    • Processor: 1.6 GHz
    • Memory: 512 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Hard Drive: 300 MB available space
    • Sound Card: On board

Posted: July 29
Most hilariously "bad" game I've played in quite awhile. It's obviously a satire and the corny plot was clearly intentional. It did its job and entertained for a few hours, and at its $0.99 price point I can only recommend.

polkatari
286 products in account
3 reviews
Recommended
7.4 hrs on record
Posted: July 18
I am glad I ignored the negative reviews for this game, This is a misunderstood game. It was never intended to be a serious blood and gore vampire game, It was a satire on the whole vampire thing, and I found that refreshing. It was also corny like a 1950 B movie, which I believe was done intentionally. There is a lot of comedy in the game. I also liked the fact that the achievements were easy to obtain for a change. The game was also short in length which I consider a plus. I get tired of these epic 100 hour plus games that developers seem fond of creating lately.
If you want a relaxing game that offers amusement and won't take weeks to complete then you will like this game.
Read More

1 person found this review funny
shade00
2,196 products in account
22 reviews
Recommended
2.8 hrs on record
Posted: July 11
what can i say about this game other then its kinda fun <3
which the story was different, and the outakes <3 pretty funny

yes there is some bugs, but they dont make it unplayable as they rarely popup and the simple fix? return to menu then back to game and bam fixed. which yes its more challanging as its kinda like the developers 1st time making a hidden object game so its not as fine tuned, but still very playable if you have the patience.

which at 1st expect to get kinda cranky at how it plays, as its missing a few elements which make hidden object games easier. but they did atleast add hints, myself i didnt use any till the achivement unlocked in the end.
which it basicly shows u were the item is, kinda vision like.

overall if you like short story based hidden object games its pretty fun, it does have some bugs, and it can be a pain in the butt and a bit challanging,even more so if u dont use hints.

but its worth playing ^w^ aslong as you dont get annoyed and grumpy easily lol, as it will make you cranky early in as you begin getting use too it.

getting grumpy reasons vary, from not being able to find the last item easily. from the 1-2 bugs that make u return to the menu for a second to fix, which only happened twice to me. which another thing that may get u a bit grumpy is finding the different areas to search for items in.

but hey, there is a walkthrough in the guides section for if anyone gets stuck ^w^ so no sweat!

so if u like hidden object games, check it out.
but do remember you have been warned it may make you a bit mad at times, which kinda any hog can do that to ya ^w^


if this review is not helpful, please leave a comment as to why u feel that way so i may make changes if needed ^w^

but this one is not bad i must say

before playing this game, my thought was only "hidden object = boring"

Shadow Cultist
261 products in account
15 reviews
Recommended
17.5 hrs on record
Posted: August 25
Sinister City is an adventure game with a hidden object element which has decent vampire theme.

This game remind me of a classic cult bad movie "PLAN 9 FROM OUTER SPACE" directed by Ed Wood. The movie is bad, and the game mimic all the bad things happened on that movie. Dialougue are cheesy, story are cheesy, the cast & characters are ridicilous too. And all the things right here make me laugh because its funny.

I can't recommend this for a good game, but if you enjoying a cheesy bad movie or a bad game (not a broken game) which is entertaining and fun. You can try this.
